title: Apply for leave on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP with your credentials.
2. Open the left-side menu and click on 'Hostels'.
3. Select 'General Outing' or 'Leave'.
4. Fill in the details and submit.
5. Wait for mentor and warden approval.
6. Download the leave form from your application table.

title: Check Time Table on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Academics.
3. Click on 'Time Table'.
4. Select the semester from the dropdown.
5. View courses, professors, timings, and venues.

title: Raise complaints in VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Open VTOP Menu → Feedback → Apply Complaint.
3. Fill in the required details.
4. Track complaint resolution and give feedback once solved.

title: Check Attendance on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Academics.
3. Click on 'Class Attendance'.
4. Select the semester.
5. View attendance percentage for each course.

title: Check Exam Results on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Examination.
3. Click on 'Marks'.
4. Select the semester.
5. View marks for each course.

title: View your Personal Information on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Profile.
3. Click on 'View Profile'.
4. Check your personal details such as address and phone number.

title: View your Educational Information on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Profile.
3. Click on 'View Profile'.
4. Check your educational information such as courses and grades.

title: View your Mentor Information on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Mentor.
3. Click on 'Mentor Details'.
4. View your mentor details.

title: View Academic Calendar on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Academics.
3. Click on 'Academics Calendar'.
4. Select semester, class group, and month.
5. View important dates.

title: Check your biometric details on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Info Corner.
3. Click on 'Biometric Log'.
4. Select date to view check-in/check-out history.

title: View and know about your faculty on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Academics.
3. Click on 'Faculty Info'.
4. Search for faculty by entering their name.

title: Check your exam schedule on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Examination.
3. Click on 'Exam Schedule'.
4. Select the semester to view schedule.

title: Know your academic regulations on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Academics.
3. Click on 'Regulations'.
4. View academic policies.

title: Check your academic curriculum on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Academics.
3. Click on 'My Curriculum'.
4. View curriculum, credits, and syllabus.

title: Check your credits distribution on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Academics.
3. Click on 'My Credits Distribution'.
4. View credit breakdown.

title: Check your syllabus on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Academics.
3. Click on 'Course Page'.
4. Select semester, course, slot, and faculty to view syllabus.

title: Upload your digital assignments on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Academics.
3. Click on 'Digital Assignments Upload'.
4. Select semester and course to upload.

title: Check your grades on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Examination.
3. Click on 'Grades'.
4. Select semester to view grades.

title: Check your current CGPA on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Examination.
3. Click on 'Grade History'.
4. View all semester grades and CGPA.

title: Check your exam timetable on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Examination.
3. Click on 'Examination Schedule'.
4. Select semester to view timetable.

title: Check your arrear details on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Examination.
3. Click on 'Arrear/ReFAT Details'.
4. View your arrear registration, schedule, evaluation, and grades.

title: Upload your attendance relaxation form on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Services.
3. Click on 'Attendance Relaxation Form'.
4. Fill details and upload the form.

title: Pay the college related fees on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Online Payments.
3. Click on 'Payments'.
4. Select tuition fee, hostel fee, etc., and complete payment.

title: Check your payment history on VTOP
text:
1. Sign in to VTOP.
2. Go to VTOP Menu → Online Payments.
3. Click on 'Payment Receipts'.
4. View and download past payment receipts.
